name: Getwithgbandz R.
text: Every time I come here, they take about seven minutes to greet us and take our order. They‚Äôre always doing online orders first priority, not the customers in the store. I‚Äôve had experience working in fast food and customers that are in store are always first priority. If you come here order on the phone or online. They take forever.

name: Jose Sanchez
text: It is exactly what I always expect from this place I love the fact that you customize your own pizza and my kids love that they can get a nice simple pizza if they want to. It feels nice that they accommodate the price for a simplistic pizza with maybe one or two  toppings

name: R.S.
text: Great branch. Friendly employees. They really make sure you get your pizza exactly the way you like it and never rush you off. Nice work!

name: Hoserama
text: Good solid pizza to order.  Very happy with my order on value and taste.

name: Raul Valencia
text: This pizza is awesome! Blood orange lemonade or Blue Sky soda, WHAT! Definitely coming back here again!

name: Sandhya Rao
text: The pizzas here are very different from the run-of-the-mill varieties in other chains. They are very good and they are ready in just a couple of minutes. Also there's option to custom build your own. Their garlic knots (I hope I am right with the name) are just awesome!

name: Zac Boudreau
text: Had pizza here a few times, always good stuff, but the last pizzas I picked up were the best ones yet whoever made them on 07/14/20 around 7:30pm deserves a raise for the best pizza skills I‚Äôve had this whole pandemic

name: Peter Lamarre
text: Place is great! Must not forget the oregano topping! Theres one young person that always burns the pizza. This would be a 4 to 5 star if she didnt burn the pizzas.

name: Tasneem Rene
text: One of my favorite Pizza eatery.....I love the finishing option....especially the Arugula, and the Balsamic Glaze.

name: James W.
text: My family ‚ù§Ô∏è this place! We can all get the pizza we want with the toppings we way.

name: LaVina Bailey
text: So yummy, I smell the barbeque sauce all the way home. One bite and I'm in love. But I still love chicken & artichoke pizza, number one craving.

name: Rachael Watkins-Martinez
text: The pizza was made to perfection! Had alot if choices I did make my own.

name: Elena Mardar
text: This place is awesome! The pizza is out of this world, and the prices are quite decent. DO NOT ORDER ONLINE. Online has less toppings (no salami, i.e.) and the delivery gave me some very cold and disgusting pizza. But eating in is a must. The atmosphere is also quite entertaining; it has this kind of funky but clean theme.

name: Cheryl Ondracek
text: I LOVE Blaze pizza, but this is the worst experience I have had anywher. I ordered delivery and had to call them just to make sure they got the order and to ask for light sauce since I couldn't do that online. Delivery was on time and ‚Ä¶More

name: Walter Gwathney
text: The staff at this location is very accommodating and the food is good.

name: Maria C.
text: Tasty crust and toppings.  Download the app for perks!

name: Kesav Idury
text: The place is neat and the options for pizza topping are good. I was disappointed by the "seasonal veggies" option in $8.75 veggie pizza  which was squash.. Seriously.. I had to upgrade to $9.75 all topping pizza and got all veggies

name: Krystal Stevens
text:
Good crust, lots of toppings to choose from
The "garlic white sauce" doesnt have much flavor. More like thickened cream. No real garlic flavor.  Decent size for the price.

name: Write Inspiration
text: Late night pizza run. First time at Blaze. Staff seemingly tired and wanting to go home. So, the friendly factor was down on the totem pole. But, I get it...it's hard to exude warmth when your ready to put out the closing sign. ‚Ä¶More

name: Cheezecake 4443
text: The pizza and salad I ordered was so good. I love the great selection of soda, juice, and tea they have to offer too. I liked that I could also make a half size for my kid.

name: Jose G
text: I was amazed i could build my own pizza with all the ingridients i wanted. Also the way the pizzas are bake its really cool. It feels natural.

name: Marcus Mesecher
text: The selection of pizza is very nice, and a plain pizza is very inexpensive. Very good in terms of food quality, as well.

name: Stephen N
text: Best pizza to get into if you like to create your own. Great for families that all want their own kind of pizza. B

name: Ryan J
text: Great pizza here. I love being able to build my own pie.

name: Cindi Long
text: It's like Chipotle but with pizza! They have a keto crust, and unlike other low carb and keto items at restaurants, this must really be truly low-carb, because I'm diabetic, and it didn't raise my blood sugar at all, and I've been there ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Wood
text: Very tasty and fast. Pretty reasonable price as well. I would go back.

name: Adriana Lozano
text: This place is super clean, service is great and the pizza was really good. Whatever the managers doing here keep up the good work!üëç build ur own pizza, there's sumthing here4EVERYONE. From gluten free and cauliflower crusts to vegan ‚Ä¶More

name: Al BeDat
text: Love the vegan options, I need to come here more. I love loading up on the toppings.

name: Keegan Ayubi
text: Great atmosphere! They have their own craft sodas and fruit drinks that taste amazing. Pizza tastes great too! Quality ingredients crafted into a delicious pizza!

name: Pam
text: Craving for pizza so came here cuz BOGO coupon. Ordered 1 with pesto oil sauce and 1 with red sauce with 1 scoop of spicy red sauce. Load with lots of veggies, fresh mozzarella, and roasted chicken. They even have roasted butternut squash. Can you spot them in the photos? Lol. Yum yum! Will go back for more.

name: Laurie Stevens
text: As as always very good pizzas.. kids loved it

name: Rupi Billing
text: The pizza toppings are good. The pizza tastes delicious. I like the vegan cheese they use, the additional toppings after the pizza is baked is great especially the pesto drizzle and arugula! Been back twice since.

name: David Peterson
text: Keto crust is a nice option. Flavors were good. Service was good too.

name: Nathaniel Dosty
text: Great taste, plenty of toppings, better than expected

name: Logan Przybyla
text: As one who has been to a lot of custom pizza chains, this is in the top 2. The toppings are all the same at all places but the crust here is best. Crispy, thin and good flavor. They do have a thick crust and gluten free option. Pieology has the most crust options but Blaze has the best crust.  We will be coming here often.

name: Lien Nguyen
text: My 6 years old son loves this place.  We come here almost every Friday after school for his dinner.  He chooses his own toppings which include pepperoni, sausages, mushrooms, black olives and bell peppers on the thick crust.

name: Victoria Schwimley
text: I don't care for this pizza, but the family likes it. I tried the salad this time and was disappointed. Their Aqua freshers are a nice change from the soda machines though, and they're doing their part for the wildlife and environment by using the straw free lids. I also feel the prices are very high for fast food.

name: Abinesh Prasad
text: Great pizza however long line if you arrive during dinner hours

name: Dustin and Marilyn Hernandez
text: Yummy, thin crust build your own pizza's

name: Christopher Hatton
text: Excellent pizza; the staff is amazing. I walked in without my glasses, couldn't read the menu, and  left with a full stomach of delicious pizza. 10/10 would go again.

name: Jose Romero
text: Quick and fast

name: Chris Joyce
text: Really enjoyed Blaze Pizza. The staff was polite and attentive and didn't burn any of our pizzas...unlike some other "pie" places in Elk Grove. Pizza was spectacular and the topping selection is superb.

name: Douglas Otter
text: They offer a "keto" cauliflower pizza crust and customer service was excellent. Pizza was not very good, crust was ok and sauce was terrible

name: Tina O'connor
text: Love this place! Green Stripe is my absolute favourite ü§ò

name: Elizabeth Lee
text: Love their gluten free crust.  Wish they would have the $5 promotion like other Blaze  locations.  Otherwise, friendly staff.

name: David ÎëêÌòÑ
text: First time visited here just to use coupon. The pizza was awesome and service was fantastic.

name: Jill
text: I really liked this place. It seemed to be above average for the make your own pizza place. Lots of options to choose from, and large servings.

name: Kit- Kat 591
text: Great pizza, great prompt service and good for the lunch rush :) Thanks!

Been on Keto six months and miss pizza.
